root.name: Th3 Plan
root.description: Th3 Plan is a stealth action game built around an elaborate art heist. Players take control of the leader a group of seven professional robbers who attempt to pull off a major artwork robbery. The game features a unique presentation where the player is able to observe the action from three different viewpoints during a mission. This perspective allows the player to keep a watchful eye on their plan and to make changes as needed. Th3 Plan tells its story over 13 missions and supports up to 3 players. Th3 Plan was developed by Eko System, produced by Monte Cristo Multimedia, and published by Crave Entertainment.
